html: 4.18.17  9:07 am   what is your name
4.18.17  8:18 am   do you think making collaborations with other people will improve and speed up your (or other people's) performance in making videos?
4.18.17  7:57 am   but y tho

4.18.17  7:57 am   who is this god person and why is everyone yelling about them all the time?

     it's not a person

4.18.17  7:53 am   which one of your videos should I watch now?

     it is your job to decide which ones to watch. it is my job to decide which ones to make

4.18.17  7:28 am   I really love your song I'm a diamond. But i'm very curious about something: did you mean diamond as in an ordinary useless thing that everybody overestimates? Or diamond as in shining bright and being happy?

     it's about the feeling of being a diamond. actually no, it's about the feeling of singing you are a diamond, in that melody, after having spent the first 4 bars in a complete anti-harmonic void. and also it is rejoicing in victory in the fact that that songwriting technique actually worked. i hope that makes sense

4.18.17  7:26 am   Are you prepared for the huge amounts of traffic/contact requests that will result from the upload of your next video?

     yes

4.18.17  6:20 am   why did you stop doing reality videos?

     to continue doing videos for the main channel(s), which i had stopped in order to make all the reality videos. i hope that makes sense

4.18.17  4:43 am   What drives you? At the moment motivation is in short supply for me and I'm wondering what makes you want to record and work

     don't focus too hard on wanting to want something. that would be an uphill, strange battle

4.18.17  4:16 am   ever seen a willow tree?

     yes

      they're gnarly.

     i agree

4.18.17  3:23 am   how does it feel to have your own website?

     nice, good, etc

     and what do you think about facebook?

     i think something like that could really take off

4.18.17  2:13 am   I feel like I want to step away from doing small things, and start focusing more on doing big, long-term things. Should I use the small things as parts to build the big things maybe?

     that might be awkward. i might suggest you try doing a medium thing

4.18.17  2:05 am   Could your growth as a human being cause you to no longer identify with many of the songs youve written but not yet recorded, and result in you discarding them and writing new stuff instead?

     no, but my experience as a songwriter might give me the tools to update them and make them stronger, to even better reflect those songs' original purpose

4.18.17  2:04 am   Is it possible for mankind to devolve into single-celled beings?

     i don't think so

4.18.17  1:06 am   Tell me the secrets of the universe please

     i am trying
4.18.17  12:18 am   wat beez yo favrite chord
4.17.17  11:39 pm   no or yes
4.17.17  11:20 pm   will any new videos you will be releasing be rendered in 60 fps and/or 2160p?

4.17.17  11:20 pm   Who stole your supply of capital letters?

     they were not stolen, sorry for the confusion

4.17.17  11:09 pm   What would you name a planet if given the opportunity?

     which planet

4.17.17  11:02 pm   would you consider doing hoj and hotewig commentary tracks

     i would be interested in talking about it extensively, but not while it is playing simultaneously. i would prefer to refer to parts as needed, and perhaps pause, etc

4.17.17  11:00 pm   What's your lifetime goal?

     to do the best i can

4.17.17  10:59 pm   On a scale of 1-10, how much do you appreciate positive comments?

     10

4.17.17  10:57 pm   Correct me if I'm wrong, but are these history videos just for you to gain viewers? Or is there something else?

     if i was trying to gain views, i would have done what all the viewers were asking me to do. which was "make more vines" "why did you stop making vines" "can you make a vine about my cat" "can you make a vine about shaving a violin" etc, that sort of thing. but instead i was determined to move on to doing one of the things that i had wanted to do for a very long time, which was make longer videos, of many different types

4.17.17  10:50 pm   What was the very second question on this page?

     you wanna check

4.17.17  10:23 pm   You say you will continue to make videos for a long, long time. Do you have any plans of stopping your career as a musician/video-maker?

     i hope to escalate to exciting new things, just as i have in the past

4.17.17  10:21 pm   Why did you make History of Japan first, though you wrote material for History of the U.S.?

     history of the united states petered out during the writing process. it was going great, and very exciting, but it was shaping up to be a bit imbalanced, because i already knew way too much about certain regions, and i didn't know how to keep the rest of it in balance. it was my first try, so i didn't really know what i was doing. then later on when i was ready to take another shot at it, i realized that i needed to pick a totally random topic where i had no prior knowledge. and i knew if that worked then i could probably do any topic

4.17.17  10:19 pm   how have the visuals in your videos evolved/have they always been the way they are? they are very aesthetic

     you will have to compare my older videos to newer ones, and decide for yourself

4.17.17  10:19 pm   is being weird a persona? Something you learned? a question you struggle with? Or am I r/im14andthisisdeep?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

4.17.17  10:01 pm   How many jingles are left to record in HOTEWIG?

     they are all partially recorded, i am now doing final vocals, harmonies, etc

4.17.17  10:00 pm   Which direction should I go if I want to find what's really good?

     start with whatever direction looks 'good' and then when you get where that takes you, look around and evaluate again, and do the same thing again
4.17.17  9:59 pm   Are you content with the content of your content?

4.17.17  9:05 pm   :) What time is it

      it was 1:19 am UTC at the time you asked this, it is 4:17 am UTC at the time i am answering it, and probably a different, later time as you are reading it

4.17.17  8:55 pm   Can you analyze this question for me?

     i don't think it needs analysis
4.17.17  8:46 pm   How was New Canaan? Did you enjoy your stay?

4.17.17  8:45 pm   what movies have you watched recently

     i've been busy making my own content, for a long time
4.17.17  7:23 pm   In your opinion, does random = funny?

4.17.17  7:02 pm   On the contrary to a recent submission, you must absolutely, under no circumstances, die, be immortal if possible pls

     i will see what i can do
4.17.17  6:44 pm   I miss you
4.17.17  6:43 pm   Do you plan on performing your material live in the future?
4.17.17  6:30 pm   How do you ask quesions?

4.17.17  5:37 pm   How do you pronounce "thabk you"?

     it can usually be assumed that thabk you means thank you, which is pronounced thank you

4.17.17  5:52 pm   Are you still trying to be a person?

     i already am a person, and have been for as long as i can remember

4.17.17  5:36 pm   What's the best thing to do with a slinky?

     you will have to try a variety of different things, and see which ones are best for you. but you probably won't need to decide, it is surely more important that you continue to enjoy the slinky, in as many ways as you like

4.17.17  5:24 pm   Do you plan on taking much time after hotewig to update the reality section? I recall that it took a hot while to update it after history of japan, which took only a fraction of the time hotewig is taking.

     this time i'm going to try to do the reality update alongside the main projects

4.17.17  5:09 pm   Have you ascended?

     yes, and also descended, and gone in a variety of other directions as well

4.17.17  5:01 pm   Will you make more content?

     i have been making content non-stop since at least 2014, and will continue doing so for a long, long time

4.17.17  4:53 pm   do you have any advice on getting people to leave you alone??

     leave them alone

4.17.17  4:50 pm   Is your new history of video longer than the history of Japan?

       yes

      If so how much?

     10 minutes

4.17.17  4:45 pm   where are new videos??

     videos can be in a wide variety of places, regardless of whether they are old or new
